languages.text: Саркофаг установлен недавно. Надпись гласит: "Здесь несет свой вечный дозор архмилитант Морт, оберегая в смерти ту, кого не уберег при жизни".
The sarcophagus was installed recently. The inscription reads: "Here, Arch-Militant Mort keeps his eternal vigil, protecting in death the one he could not protect in life."
languages.original_text: Саркофаг установлен недавно. Надпись гласит: "Здесь несет свой вечный дозор архмилитант Морт, оберегая в смерти ту, кого не уберег при жизни".

languages.text: Der Sarcophagus wurde erst kürzlich installiert. Die Inschrift lautet: "Hier hält Erzmilitant Mort seine ewige Wacht, um jenen im Tod zu schützen, den er im Leben nicht zu schützen vermochte."
languages.original_text: The sarcophagus was installed recently. The inscription reads: "Here, Arch-Militant Mort keeps his eternal vigil, protecting in death the one he could not protect in life."

traits.locale_text: Der Sarcophagus wurde erst kürzlich installiert. Die Inschrift lautet: "Hier hält Erzmilitant Mort seine ewige Wacht, um jenen im Tod zu schützen, den er im Leben nicht zu schützen vermochte."

languages.text: Le sarcophage a été installé récemment. L'inscription indique : « Ci-gît l'archimilitant Mort, qui dans la mort veillera sur celui qu'il n'a pas su protéger de son vivant. »
languages.original_text: The sarcophagus was installed recently. The inscription reads: "Here, Arch-Militant Mort keeps his eternal vigil, protecting in death the one he could not protect in life."

traits.locale_text: Le sarcophage a été installé récemment. L'inscription indique : « Ci-gît l'archimilitant Mort, qui dans la mort veillera sur celui qu'il n'a pas su protéger de son vivant. »

languages.text: El sarcófago fue instalado recientemente. La inscripción reza: «Aquí monta guardia eterna el Archimilitante Mort, protegiendo en la muerte a aquella a quien no pudo salvar en vida».
languages.original_text: The sarcophagus was installed recently. The inscription reads: "Here, Arch-Militant Mort keeps his eternal vigil, protecting in death the one he could not protect in life."

traits.locale_text: El sarcófago fue instalado recientemente. La inscripción reza: «Aquí monta guardia eterna el Archimilitante Mort, protegiendo en la muerte a aquella a quien no pudo salvar en vida».

languages.text: 棺が設置されたのは最近だ。碑文には「ここにアーク・ミリタントのモート、永遠に警戒を続け、生前守れなかった者を死において守る」と刻まれている。
languages.original_text: The sarcophagus was installed recently. The inscription reads: "Here, Arch-Militant Mort keeps his eternal vigil, protecting in death the one he could not protect in life."

traits.locale_text: 棺が設置されたのは最近だ。碑文には「ここにアーク・ミリタントのモート、永遠に警戒を続け、生前守れなかった者を死において守る」と刻まれている。

languages.text: 这尊棺柩是最近才被安放在这里的，上面的碑文写道：“在这里，首席战士莫特将会永远保持警惕，在死后守护他生前未能守护之人。”
languages.original_text: The sarcophagus was installed recently. The inscription reads: "Here, Arch-Militant Mort keeps his eternal vigil, protecting in death the one he could not protect in life."

traits.locale_text: 这尊棺柩是最近才被安放在这里的，上面的碑文写道：“在这里，首席战士莫特将会永远保持警惕，在死后守护他生前未能守护之人。”

languages.text: Lahit yakın zamanda kurulmuş. Üzerinde şöyle yazıyor: "Başmilitan Mort, ebedî nöbetini burada tutuyor ve yaşamında koruyamadıklarını ölümünde koruyor."
languages.original_text: The sarcophagus was installed recently. The inscription reads: "Here, Arch-Militant Mort keeps his eternal vigil, protecting in death the one he could not protect in life."
